thread.title: AMAZING! Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol Topples Pulimurugan's Record!
thread.title_full: AMAZING! Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol Topples Pulimurugan's Record!

title: AMAZING! Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol Topples Pulimurugan's Record!
text:
Â» AMAZING! Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol Topples Pulimurugan's Record! AMAZING! Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol Topples Pulimurugan's Record! Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol, starring   role has broken one of the records set by Pulimurugan.   12:36   
Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol , starring Mohanlal and Meena in the lead roles has already conquered the land of Kerala. The film, which released on January 20, 2017, is marching ahead at the box office. Pulimurugan (U): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
Recently, Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol was released in Ireland, through PJ Entertainments. Now, according to the latest reports, the film has eclipsed a record set by Mohanlal's previous blockbuster, Pulimurugan. 
Reportedly, Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol , which released on February 17, 2017 in Ireland, has set a new first day collection record for a Malayalam film, which was earlier held by Pulimurugan. 
If reports are to be believed, the film had a grand opening in Ireland. The film was also released in UAE and GCC recently, and the movie has opened to positive reviews in those centres as well. 
Meanwhile, Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol has completed one month of its run   film has already crossed the 30-Crore mark at the all India box office. The movie also recently completed 10,000 shows in Kerala. 
The film is still doing some grand business despite facing stiff competition from Prithviraj's most recent release Ezra , which has also taken the box office by storm.
